Statements from U: S. Rep. Mark Pocan, D-Madison, who claimed that Gov. Scott Walker said his bald spot came from hitting his head on a cabinet.
Quotes from Walker himself: mentioning his bald spot and attributing it to an incident in the kitchen when he banged his head on a cabinet door while making repairs requested by his wife.
Citations of news articles from the Wisc: s statements about his bald spot being the result of hitting his head on a cabinet and fixing a sink.
Comparison of the physical appearance of: noting that Pocan has less hair than Walker.
